column3: >Also if CWallet::SetSpentKeyState were ever called with used=false in v0.20, the EraseDestData(batch, dst, "used") call would have no effect, and there address would be marked unused in memory but stored as used on disk\n\nIs this path possible in 0.20? Should I add the EraseDestData here too perhaps?
It doesn't look possible with the current codebase, to reach an `EraseDestData` for change, especially not for the "used" key.
Closing this as it has no motivation without #18550
